fields.description: Reimplement tableviews and tableviewcells using the latest APIs from Apple.  The old tableview implementation was based on 3.2 APIs and has grown crufty.  Additionally, implement a minimal dynamic data source API to feed the table.  Use Apple apis for search.
fields.summary: Reimplement TableViews and provide minimal dynamic data source API
